author: Gaurang Chauhan
title: Arshad Warsi and Sajid Khan were background dancers in this Jeetendra-Anil Kapoor starrer - watch video! - Bollywoodlife.com
text: Arshad Warsi and Sajid Khan… Arshad Warsi and Sajid Khan were background dancers in this Jeetendra-Anil Kapoor starrer – watch video! Many are aware of the fact that before making it big as an actor, Arshad Warsi was a choreographer but not many know that he was a background dancer to Jeetendra in this 1989 action film. By Gaurang Chauhan | Published: January 31, 2017 5:54 pm
